song_lyric:
Wake	up	little	humming	bird
Wake	up	little	butterfly
Let	us	flying	into	blue	blue	sky

Wake	up	little	golden	fish
Wake	up	little	sweety	dolphin
Let	us	swimming	into	ocean	deep

Woo	so	fresh	the	air
Woo	golden	sunshine
Woo	sing	a	song
Make	it	flow	to	everywhere
Beautiful	oh
Beautiful	oh
Beautiful	oh
Make	the	world	to	be	as	one
